overview: Show I opens with a stellar credit sequence like the opening to "Survivor." Everybody arrives, summoned to the von Fistenberg castle to take part in a sex-based elimination contest, the winner becoming the personal confidant of the billionare von Fistengberg, receiving 10,000 a week allowance, a car, a private jet, and he gets to live in the 50 room gothic mansion, with a full staff...  worth playing for?
title: The Show
